code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CompanyDetails=()=>{const{symbol}=useParams();const[company,setCompany]=useState(null);const[error,setError]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{const fetchCompany=async()=>{try{const res=await fetch("http://localhost:3001/companies/".concat(symbol));const data=await res.json();if(!res.ok){setError(data.message||'Company not found');return;}setCompany(data);}catch(err){console.error(err);setError('Failed to fetch company data.');}};fetchCompany();},[symbol]);if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"p-10 text-red-600",children:error});if(!company)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"p-10",children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-10  dark:bg-gray-900 text-gray-900 dark:text-slate-200",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:["Company Details: ",company.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("table",{className:"table-auto border-collapse border border-y-slate-400 dark:bg-slate-300 text-gray-900 dark:slate-300",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:Object.entries(company).map(_ref=>{let[key,value]=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"border px-4 py-2 font-semibold",children:key}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"border px-4 py-2",children:value})]},key);})})})]});};export default CompanyDetails;
